verses.translation_en: Have you considered him who calls the judgment a lie?
That is the one who treats the orphan with harshness,
verses.translation_id: Maka itulah orang yang menghardik anak yatim,

verses.translation_en: And does not urge (others) to feed the poor.
verses.translation_id: dan tidak mendorong memberi makan orang miskin.

verses.translation_en: So woe to the praying ones,
Who are unmindful of their prayers,
And withhold the necessaries of life.
